operator.title: Step3
operator.synopsis: Super Operator Template for Step 3 Assess WPW and IVCD

text.paragraph: This is a super operator defined for Step 3 in ECG diagnosis, with pre-deined input ports and outpot ports.
The input and output Control ports are to pass control signal between steps. The input and output other ports are extenders for customized inputs. The Summary output port passes data of this step.

inputPorts.port: Input port for control signal, indicating the sequence of execution.

outputPorts.port: Output port for control signal, indicating the sequence of execution.
Information of current step, represented as a pack object containing this step object.
